title: Ping went from 40 to 90
body: Pretty much what title says ive been playing with 40 ping since the server change and randomly today in the middle of a game it jumped up to 90 and hasn't gone down since i just dont get on what could of changed.

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons, maybe with your network or even how your ISP is routing to the game server.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for this match to know what's happening for sure, which I'm expecting to come up as packet loss.  The results should also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know what you find!
